tool_description: Analyzes customer payment patterns, calculates payment performance metrics, and identifies trends in payment behavior over specified periods.

payment_dates.description: Array of payment dates corresponding to payment amounts

due_dates.description: Array of due dates corresponding to payments

late_payment_threshold_days.description: Number of days past due to consider payment late (1-90)

error_messages: Invalid customer_id: Customer identifier cannot be empty.
Invalid payment_records: Must provide at least one payment record with positive amounts.
Array length mismatch: payment_records, payment_dates, and due_dates arrays must have the same length.
Invalid date format: All dates must be in valid date-time format.
Invalid analysis_period_months: Must be between 1 and 60 months.
Invalid late_payment_threshold_days: Must be between 1 and 90 days.
usage: Provide customer_id, payment_records, payment_dates, and due_dates arrays of equal length. Optionally set analysis_period_months and late_payment_threshold_days to customize the analysis scope and late payment definition.

total_payments_analyzed.description: Number of payments included in analysis

on_time_payment_percentage.description: Percentage of payments made on time

average_days_late.description: Average number of days late for late payments

payment_trend.description: Payment behavior trend: Improving, Stable, or Deteriorating

analysis_date.description: Date when analysis was performed in date-time format
